LanguageData.HC_Yeti.label: Yeti
LanguageData.HC_Yeti.description: An ape with a height of nearly 9.5 feet and soft white fur. He is very careful and he is reluctant to come into contact with external creatures, and he possesses supernatural strength commensurate with his size.
LanguageData.HC_Yeti.tools.0.label: left fist
LanguageData.HC_Yeti.tools.1.label: right fist
LanguageData.HC_Yeti.tools.2.label: teeth
LanguageData.HC_Yeti.tools.3.label: head
